characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If your army is Battle-forged, all INFANTRY, BIKERS and HELBRUTE units in an ALPHA LEGION Detachment gain the following ability: Your opponent must subtract 1 from hit rolls that target units with this trait if they are more than 12" away.

profiles.name: Hidden In Plain Sight
profiles.book: Codex Heretic Astartes - Chaos Space Marines
